医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
预防性 SMA 疗法的比较研究显示出不同的结果在一项首项此类研究中，研究人员比较了两个匹配良好的研究组之间脊髓性肌萎缩症 (SMA) 预防性治疗的疗效，分别使用基因疗法 (onasemnogene abeparvovec) 或与 risdiplam（口服药物）联合使用）或 nusinersen（鞘内注射）在出现明显疾病迹象之前施用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Comparative-study-on-preventative-SMA-therapies-shows-mixed-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Comparative-study-on-preventative-SMA-therapies-shows-mixed-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4643dc8-2b8c-4241-9186-40af3f59c15f Tue, 25 Jun 2024 22:29:36 -0400 Comparative study on preventative SMA therapies shows mixed outcomes
创新的胰岛素算法增强住院患者的血糖控制具有复杂饮食限制的住院患者经常会出现高血糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Innovative-insulin-algorithm-enhances-glucose-control-for-hospitalized-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Innovative-insulin-algorithm-enhances-glucose-control-for-hospitalized-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=da8d0be0-5a64-4a24-a4c1-c89f870061fb Tue, 25 Jun 2024 22:24:11 -0400 Innovative insulin algorithm enhances glucose control for hospitalized patients
突破性生物标志物预测透明细胞肾癌的复发风险密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的研究人员发现了一种生物标志物，可以帮助识别哪些肾癌患者复发风险较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Breakthrough-biomarker-predicts-recurrence-risk-in-clear-cell-renal-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Breakthrough-biomarker-predicts-recurrence-risk-in-clear-cell-renal-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6963a0fb-0298-4355-a401-86a73847ab3e Tue, 25 Jun 2024 22:18:33 -0400 Breakthrough biomarker predicts recurrence risk in clear cell renal cancer
研究表明，李子可以保护绝经后女性的骨骼结构和强度乳制品并不是唯一对骨骼健康有益的食物。宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，李子还可以保护绝经后女性的骨骼结构和强度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Prunes-may-protect-bone-struct-and-strength-in-postmenopausal-women-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Prunes-may-protect-bone-struct-and-strength-in-postmenopausal-women-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d87223b7-2f63-470d-84b4-acf0061d843d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 21:18:22 -0400 Prunes may protect bone structure and strength in postmenopausal women, study reveals
研究表明间歇性禁食和健康饮食计划对大脑健康有益约翰·霍普金斯大学医学院和美国国立卫生研究院国家衰老研究所的研究人员表示，他们对 40 名患有肥胖症和胰岛素抵抗的老年人进行了研究，这些老年人被随机分配接受间歇性禁食饮食或美国农业部批准的标准健康饮食。美国农业部）提供了有关这两种饮食计划对大脑健康的潜在益处的重要线索。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Study-reveals-brain-health-benefits-of-intermittent-fasting-and-healthy-diet-plans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Study-reveals-brain-health-benefits-of-intermittent-fasting-and-healthy-diet-plans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3088e8f-9365-4230-b992-85cc0984dfbd Tue, 25 Jun 2024 21:14:40 -0400 Study reveals brain health benefits of intermittent fasting and healthy diet plans
镰状细胞病的新疗法在国际试验中显示出有希望的结果范德比尔特大学医学中心 (VUMC) 的研究人员正在宣传一项多中心、国际 2 期临床试验的数据，该试验显示了镰状细胞病 (SCD) 的一种新的治疗方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease-shows-promising-results-in-international-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-curative-treatment-for-sickle-cell-disease-shows-promising-results-in-international-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1438e135-1771-4137-96eb-9aa949556bff Tue, 25 Jun 2024 21:05:38 -0400 New curative treatment for sickle cell disease shows promising results in international trial
新报告强调迫切需要针对性别的心血管研究和护理心血管疾病是女性死亡的主要原因，而女性和男性之间在护理和获取服务方面仍然存在差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-report-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-gender-specific-cardioangio-research-and-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/New-report-highlights-the-urgent-need-for-gender-specific-cardioangio-research-and-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af757946-031a-4fcb-bd49-4a205a54897d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:59:30 -0400 New report highlights the urgent need for gender-specific cardiovascular research and care
洛杉矶县批准居民医疗债务减免洛杉矶县监管机构周二一致投票决定购买并免除数百万美元的医疗债务，这是一项全面计划的一部分，旨在解决给近 80 万居民带来的 29 亿美元的负担。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Los-Angeles-County-approves-medical-debt-relief-for-residents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Los-Angeles-County-approves-medical-debt-relief-for-residents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b11406ac-ffcf-4078-bfe8-cb25c4883e5d Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:53:36 -0400 Los Angeles County approves medical debt relief for residents
体力活动可显着降低老年人的全因死亡风险和心血管死亡风险体力活动可显着降低老年人，尤其是社会经济地位较低的老年人的全因死亡风险和心血管死亡风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Physical-activity-significantly-reduces-all-cause-and-cardioangio-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Physical-activity-significantly-reduces-all-cause-and-cardioangio-mortality-risks-in-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=687a72b0-77a8-4a94-ad2f-834f901ffaa7 Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:50:00 -0400 Physical activity significantly reduces all-cause and cardiovascular mortality risks in older adults
母乳库可改善婴儿健康，但不能完全替代母乳科学家们研究了母乳库及其对婴儿健康的影响，强调了捐赠母乳和母乳在肠道微生物群和发育方面的差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Human-milk-banks-improve-infant-health-but-cant-filled-replace-mothers-milk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240625/Human-milk-banks-improve-infant-health-but-cant-filled-replace-mothers-milk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fb722e5-0799-4fd8-ad7c-81483fbe9bca Tue, 25 Jun 2024 20:18:00 -0400 Human milk banks improve infant health but can't fully replace mother's milk
